{"query":"mutation addJob(
  $employeeId: ID!
  $jobTitle: String!
  $employmentType: String!
  $startDate: DateTime!
  $location: String!
  $description: String!
  $department: String,
  $salary: Float,
  $salaryFrequency: String,
  $salaryCurrency: String
){
  addJob(
    employeeId: $employeeId
    job: {
      title: $jobTitle
      employmentType: $employmentType
      startDate: $startDate
      location: $location
      description: $description
      department: $department
      salary: $salary,
      salaryFrequency: $salaryFrequency
      salaryCurrency: $salaryCurrency,
    }
  ) {
    id
    title
    salaryCurrency
  }
}
","variables":{"employeeId":"5f4f9ebce6244dda37484560","jobTitle":"Team Lead","employmentType":"Full-Time","startDate":"2019-10-01","location":"Nuevera","description":"Full Stack Developer"},"operationName":"addJob"}
